main.name: Luís Macedo
bio: Hello, my name is Luís Macedo. I'm 23 and from Portugal. Currently finishing my Master's in Computer Engineering and a Research grant, both on Computer Security.
My dissertation is to explore the capabilities of Arm TrustZone in a Robot Operating System 2 (ROS2) with the help of libddssec.
I'm very interested in cybersecurity and enjoy developing web applications, mainly the front-end.

work.company: INESC Technology and Science - Associate Laboratory
work.title: Research Assistant (Research Grant)
description: I am designing, implementing, and evaluating a prototype that capitalizes on security capabilities added by TrustZone (OP-TEE), namely attestation, to respond to the security challenges posed by the ROS2 and implement this solution in a real environment (on an ARM chip).

work.title: Software Engineer
description: In collaboration with Accenture, my group and I was tasked to improve an already built fleet management web app on the Google Cloud Platform. I implemented new features, mainly on the front-end, using ReactJS.
In addition, my group and I did research and wrote a technical report on optimizing current public transport services in a futuristic scenario based primarily on Machine Learning pipelines.
